dc:title: Day After Day - Thoughts On Breadlines And On The War
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Recommends daily Mass and Communion as a necessary means of bringing relief to those suffering in war and on the breadlines. Announces the formation of a "Non-Participation League"--refusing to buy from or support unjust companies as a training in voluntary poverty and non-violent resistance.
